product_name: KRISTIN ESS HAIRNANOBLACK 3-In-One Ceramic Curling Flat Iron Hair Straightener
summary: SummaryThe Kristin Ess Hair NANOBLACK 3-In-One Ceramic Flat Iron Hair Straightener does it all! Create a range of looks including sleek straight styles, s-waves, flat iron waves + curls.
details: DetailsFeatures1.25" ceramic plates with Soft Heat Technology deliver negative ions to eliminate frizz and lock in moisture for healthier-looking hairFloating plates adjust to your hair texture for smooth styling, without snagging or creasingDigital display + 4 temperature pre-sets (up to 440 F) allows you to customize the temperature to your hair type and textureUniversal voltage + automatic shut-off after 30 minutes of non-use for worry-free styling anywhere in the world9 ft swivel cordIncludesHeat resistant cap for easy storingItem 2579161

reviews.headline: Its okay...
reviews.comments: This straightener is okay. It's not good or bed. It gets the job done but your hair texture will depend on just how long that takes.

reviews.headline: Great straightener!
reviews.comments: Got this on sale & i love it! The last time i purchased a straightener was roughly 10 years ago and it was a babyliss pro, so perhaps im out of the loop, but this straightener is awesome, especially for the price. 10/10 would recommend

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: It was an okay flat iron while it lasted. I had mine for a little over a year..the last straightener I had costed less and lasted me 5ish years. I would save your money on this one.

reviews.headline: I don't know if I would buy this straightener again
reviews.comments: I've had this for less than 4 months and the button is not working well already. I accidentally threw the receipt away and I regret it. I liked it before the button stopped working except the hr. timer.

reviews.headline: Love for soft waves
reviews.comments: I have thin, wavy hair with some crazy curly strands here and there, and this straightener smoothed everything without making things frizzy. Absolutely love it for soft curls—the larger plates make it look like I've used a curling iron, but with half the effort.

reviews.headline: Awful
reviews.comments: After using for 4 months, it won't stay on. It gives an error message and automatically turns off

reviews.headline: Really works well…
reviews.comments: I love the color and the deisgn of the straightener. Its matte black! It works very well and heats up very fast. Straightens hair very nice.

reviews.headline: MY FAVE and GO TO
reviews.comments: Not sure what all the bad reviews are about. One of the best straighteners I've ever owned. 4yrs old and still like new. Glides like butter and keeps my naturally curly hair frizz free! My hair stays super silky with this compared to others Ive tried. No issues of weird smell or burning my hair. It curls beautifully also. But makes my hair super shiny and doesnt snag. For the record I have 3a/b curls & live in FL w/ high humidity. I advise buying in the store to test out n make sure the plates align and fully touch when squeezed together. As ive noticed w/ all straighters if they dont you will have uneven results and itll cause snagging.

reviews.headline: MY FAVE! Out of all the others I've tried
reviews.comments: I don't understand all the bad reviews. My guess is user error or receiving one from a bad batch maybe?? But this is by far my favorite straightener ever. I've had mine for 4yrs now and it's still like new. From day 1, it glides down my hair like butter leaving it silky smooth shiny and straight. I dont have any issues with snagging like I always do with other straightners. And it curls beautifully. Been contemplating buying another just to have as backup in case this one dies at some point and my luck this one ends up discontinued. I have 3a/b curls partially thick with some fine areas. And I only need one pass to obtain great results. The matte black finish is also soft and aesthetic. I love it b/c after trying others, the sweat or product build up from my hands will cause my hand to slip when using. But this has a great comfy grip. I just make sure to always clean it with a damp rag  after to keep it clean & looking new. I've also noticed that my hair stays silkier when I use it vs others. It also frizzes less somehow, and I live in FL.  My advice is try for yourself. And buy it in the store to examine it first, as I've noticed w/all brands that the plates don't always line up perfectly (like when squeezed down so the plates touch) which can cause snagging and uneven results.

reviews.headline: I love this flat iron
reviews.comments: This flat iron is fantastic. It curls and straighten.  My hair looks amazing.

reviews.headline: i would buy this again fr
reviews.comments: i have it already for more than 4 years i think and it still works like when i first bought it, its super easy to use and you can make curls and straighten your hair, i would highly recommend it < 3

reviews.headline: Fantastic Until It Stopped Staying On
reviews.comments: Perfect for straightening and curling. But it didn't last—stopped turning on after about a year and a half.  I used it at 365 feel like at that minimal temp it should have lasted much longer.

reviews.headline: Don't Do It!
reviews.comments: This straightner died after about 10 months of use. I have other styling tools so this was not used enough to die on me. I looked into a warranty swap and they make it so complicated.

reviews.headline: holy grail
reviews.comments: i have purchased this exact flat iron 2 times. only reason i had to get a new one was because i gave my mom my previous one! it is so easy to use and overall super smooth on the hair! couldn't say enough great things about it!

reviews.headline: LOVE tool!
reviews.comments: I have naturally semi-straight hair, however I want my hair to be all the way straight! This tool does both straighten and give me beach wavy curls. I also got it on sale too, so that's a BIG perk!

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: After purchasing many flat irons and it not working for my curly hair, this one is definitely the best I have used. I have spent over $300 on good reviewed flat irons and none of them work. This one has left my hair soft smooth and not at all fluffy. I hope this will last and not break but i will be purchasing again if it does.

reviews.headline: Stopped working
reviews.comments: I bought this hair straightener back in December of 2022. At first it worked really well for me. Unfortunately, as of last month this product doesn't work anymore. When I plug it in everything appears to be fine, until I try to turn it on to heat up. It heats up for 10 seconds, then turns off. It continues to turn off after 10 seconds every time I try to turn it on now. I would not buy this hair straightner again or at all.

reviews.headline: Doesn't work after a year!
reviews.comments: I bought this about a year and half ago and the power button doesnt work. All was fine worked great till it stopped. It'll heat up for like 15sec then turn off again! Cant exhcnage it with a receipt (within a year time spam). Maybe if you got a warnity you could get ut replaced. DONT RECOMMEND.

reviews.headline: Loved this until it died
reviews.comments: I loved this straightener until it died. I have had the steaightener for two years and it has worked great. It heat up quickly, my hair felt smooth and held the styles for the majority of the day. But whenever i would wrap up the straightener to put it away there was always an issue. After a while the protective cover for the wires were exposed and then it just stopped working. I always made sure to wrap up the wires with not much tension so this wouldnt happen but unfortunately it did. Once the wires were exposed, it would turn on for a few seconds but then it would turn off. My straightener before this one lasted about 8 years before I had to replace it so pretty disappointed this only lasted about 2. My only complaint is that I wish it lasted longer!

reviews.headline: Do not buy
reviews.comments: As a curly hair i suggest you not buy this straightner. Hair doesn't stay straight becomes wavy and frizzy compared to other more affordable straightners. Should've returned when i had the chance.

media.headline: Stopped working in just over a year, company will not reply

faceoff_positive.comments:
I have been looking to replace my Babybliss titanium flat iron, which while it got hot fast, it just made my curls go frizzy. I had heard that ceramic was better if you want a smooth look for thick hair, so I did some research and found this one. It is slightly heavier than the titanium, but the difference is negligible. I have thick straight hair that likes to poof when air dried and it's stubborn when it comes to holding curls. I tried this iron for both straightening and curling and it runs smoothly through the hair with no snagging. Compared to titanium iron, this one actually does give either style a smooth look - yay no frizz! 

The price point on this thing doesn't diminish the quality you get! I was lucky to get this iron for around $50 after a discount. So happy to have this iron for under $100! And it is equivalent to a CHi or any other higher priced brand out there.
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have 3B curly long hair unfortunately takes a about 3-4 passes to get a nice straight look. Decided to try a new brand after my Chi Lava flat iron needed to be replaced. This works great as a touch up tool or if you're hair isn't 3B or higher curl. Tried it out on my sister's wavy medium length hair worked beautifully. Would recommend on wavy hair types. If you have any high curl or deep wave hair types I would pass on this one.
faceoff_negative.headline: Wouldn't recommend on curly hair

rollup.name: NANOBLACK 3-In-One Ceramic Curling Flat Iron Hair Straightener
